casebody.data:
No. 10-7509. Richard Lamont Lighty, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1124, 131 S. Ct. 845,

178 L. Ed. 2d 580,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9748. December 13, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 382 Fed. Appx. 276.
